name: Process wise Production Report
query:
select 
	jo.production_order as "Production Order:Link/Production Order:100",
	ifnull(jo.production_order_quantity,0) as "Expected Qty:Data:120",
        ifnull(jo.sales_order,Null) as "Sales Order:Data:120",
	ifnull(sum(case when jo.process='Shearing' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Shearing,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Welding' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Welding,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Cutting' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Cutting,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Cleaning' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Cleaning,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Hot Dip Galvanizing' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as HDG,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Powder Coating' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Powder_Coating,

	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Cleaning' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Cleaning,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Pre Gal Insp' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Pre_Gal_Insp,

	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Wet Coating' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Wet_Coating,
ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Punching' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Punching,
	ifnull(sum(case when  jo.process='Final Inspection' then  jo.completed_job else 0 end),0) as Final_Inspection,
	ifnull(sum(jo.rejected_qty),0) as "Rejected Quantity:Data:120"
from `tabJob Order Detail` jo ,`tabJob Card` jc
group by  jo.production_order;
